explains: adj. 宏伟的；堂皇的；浮夸的；宏大的

sentences.en: The grandiose scheme for a journey across the desert came to nothing.
sentences.cn: 不切实际的穿越沙漠计划已成泡影。

sentences.en: The sad truth is that not one of Tim's grandiose plans has even begun.
sentences.cn: 可悲的是，蒂姆那些华而不实的计划没有一项付诸实施。

sentences.en: This year will be particularly grandiose.
